questUid.description: The unique identifier of the quest being tracked.

personaUid.description: The unique identifier of the persona or user whose quest progress is being tracked.

productUid.description: The uid of the product that this quest progress is associated with.

progress.description: The persona's current progress for each of the quest requirements.

oneOf.description: The persona's current progress for each of the quest requirements.

completions.description: The number of times that the quest has been completed by the persona.

dateLastCompleted.description: The date and time that the persona last completed the quest.

dateLastStarted.description: The date and time that the persona last started the quest.

unlocked.description: Indicates if the persona has unlocked and can begin the quest.

unlockProgress.description: The persona's curent progress towards unlocking the quest.

oneOf.description: The persona's curent progress towards unlocking the quest.

name.description: The unique name of the quest.

title.description: A textual title or name of the quest.

description.description: A textual description of the quest.

icon.description: The icon to display when representing the quest.

entityUid.description: The universally unique identifier of the entity that gives out the quest.

productUid.description: The uid of the product that this definition is associated with.

requirements.description: The list of requirements that the persona must fulfill to complete the quest.

oneOf.description: The list of requirements that the persona must fulfill to complete the quest.

rewards.description: The list of rewards that will be given once the quest has been completed.

oneOf.description: The list of rewards that will be given once the quest has been completed.

dateAvailable.description: The date and time that the quest will be first made available. A `null` value indicates immediately available.

dateFinished.description: The date and time that the quest will no longer be available. A `null` value indicates no end date.

frequency.description: The frequency that the quest can be repeated (e.g. 5m, 1h, 1w). A `null` value indicates that the quest cannot be repeated.

unlockRequirements.description: The list of requirements that the persona must meet to unlock the quest.

oneOf.description: The list of requirements that the persona must meet to unlock the quest.

autostart.description: Set to `true` to have quests automatically start tracking progress once unlocked, otherwise set to `false`. Default value is `false`.

data.description: Stores any custom data to be used by the product.
